name: Lucky Seven
description: Each turn, grants +5 to one of the following stats: Str, Mag, Spd, Def, Res, Hit or Avo. If the Unit has more than 1 instance of Lucky Seven, the ability cannot stack and the Unit only gains 1 stat boost. Instead, the Unit gains the option to reroll their Lucky Seven once per turn.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
